title: Vintage Dexter Medina Golf Shoes Black Brogue Cap Toe Derby 11.5D
listperfectly_description:
Classic Dexter Medina cap-toe derby golf shoes with kiltie fringe and metal spikes.

Built for the fairway and sharp enough for the clubhouse, this Made in USA black leather pair features full brogue detailing, a clean cap toe, stamped leather soles, and traditional metal spikes for old-school traction and style.

You will receive the following item(s):
- Men's golf shoes (pair)

Measurements:
- Size / Fit: US 11.5 / UK 10.5 / EU 44.5 / AU 10.5 / Width Reg
- Outsole length (heel-to-toe): 12.8 in (32.4 cm)
- Outsole width (widest): 4.5 in (11.4 cm)
- Insole length (heel to toe): 11.8 in (29.8 cm)
- Insole width (ball area): 3.9 in (9.9 cm)
- Heel height: 1 in (2.5 cm)
- Platform height (forefoot): 0.4 in (1 cm)
- Toe box height: 1.2 in (3 cm)
- Weight (pair): 3.60 lb (1.63 kg)

Photos show condition and measurements; ask if you need a specific angle or detail confirmed—grab them before they’re gone.
